mapper.select: select * from board_free where usercode = #{usercode} order by modifieddate desc
select * from board_review where usercode = #{usercode} order by registereddate desc
select * from board_inquiry where usercode = #{usercode} order by registereddate desc

SELECT board_inquiry.*, member_table.nickname, CASE WHEN COUNT(bia.questioncode) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS hasAnswer FROM board_inquiry JOIN member_table ON board_inquiry.usercode = member_table.usercode LEFT JOIN board_inquiry_answer bia ON board_inquiry.questioncode = bia.questioncode WHERE board_inquiry.usercode = #{usercode} GROUP BY board_inquiry.questioncode, member_table.nickname ORDER BY hasAnswer ASC, board_inquiry.registereddate ASC LIMIT 0, 10;
